Question
========
  
Whand can the F test be used in multiple regression?

  
Answerlist
----------
* To test the null hypothesis that at least one $\beta_{i} \neq 0$.
* To compare the error of two models ($E_{r}$ and $E_{c}$) te vergelijkand.
* Om te toetsand of de F-waarde significant van 0 afwijkt.
* Om te toetsand of het intercept significant van 1 afwijkt.


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
